name: Jack Barrett
review: VERY good app. But there are 3 things. If you can't connect to their API it's gonna say no info available. Even when it works soon after the refresh button in app just does nothing. Only when I reopen it works. The other thing is "expected delays" should be shown in app. Also option to change between "minutes left" and exact time will be nice.

name: BluInstinct
review: Very good app, needs to start showing RTI for the bus routes GoAhead have taken over though, I mainly use the 17a and now I can't check real time for it. The TFI app is useless so depending on this one

name: Paulo Lush Imports
review: if it worked would be really handy, but it just doesnt, no matter if im with 4G or right beside a wifi router. keeps giving error. FIX IT PLEASE, as it could be really handy

review: The latest version won't work. App keeps crashing upon opening it.
